thread.title: Dohop Provides Additional Content to Yandex.Flights

author: cbs8
title: Dohop Provides Additional Content to Yandex.Flights
text:
Dohop
REYKJAVIK, Iceland , September 24,
Starting today, Yandex.Flights will augment their own flight search results by displaying results provided by D ohop .
(Logo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150924/270439LOGO )
Yandex , Russia's largest search engine, has selected Dohop 's award-winning flight search to add more flight pricing options to their flight search product, Yandex.Flights. The cooperation will be launched today, and is the result of several months of intensive work.
Yandex will, according to the agreement, display content directly from Dohop alongside its own content, thus giving Yandex users on the Russian market more pricing options.
Yandex is one of the largest internet companies in Europe and operates Russia's most popular search engine, with about 60% of all search traffic in Russia . Yandex is currently the world's 19th most visited website and the company also operates in Ukraine , Kazakhstan , Belarus and Turkey . Yandex shares are listed on the Nasdaq stock market and the company's current market value is roughly 3.7 billion dollars .
Dohop has direct agreements with the world's leading airlines and online travel agents and, thanks to their unique technology, can find otherwise elusive fares and connections among their extensive vendor database. One of Dohop's main features is the ability to offer connections of low cost airlines around the world via their Self-Connect options.
" Our cooperation with Yandex is a big step forward for Dohop. It validates the hard work and innovation we have put into our flight search technology and lets us help an emerging market find and book flights. We are thrilled that Yandex decided to use our solution and look forward to worki ng with them, " says David Gunnarsson , CEO of Dohop.
About Dohop
Since its launch in 2005, Dohop has provided travellers with a global flight search engine, where users can find the cheapest flights from a range of airlines and online travel agencies. Today, the range of services also includes hotels and car rentals , as well as various forms of B2B applications for airlines and airports and whitelabel travel search engines. Dohop is available worldwide in 29 languages and has its headquarters in Reykjavik, Iceland .
In December 2014 , Dohop was awarded "The World's Leading Flight Comparison Website" at The World Travel Awards .
For more information
David Gunnarsson
CEO of Dohop
